TRAIT_F_SINCERE_DESC: Prefers telling the truth as-is and feels strong aversion to deception or backroom deals.
TRAIT_F_DECEPTIVE_DESC: Adapts the truth to the situation and may use lying or manipulation as a tool when needed.
TRAIT_F_FAIR_MINDED_DESC: Tries to keep rules and promises, strongly disliking cheating or unfair privilege.
TRAIT_F_CORRUPT_DESC: Feels little hesitation about bribes, embezzlement, or exploiting others if it is unlikely to be punished.
TRAIT_F_FRUGAL_DESC: Values practicality over luxury, conserving resources and avoiding showy spending.
TRAIT_F_GREEDY_DESC: Craves more reward and resources, easily feeling resentment or envy in loss or sharing situations.
TRAIT_F_MODEST_DESC: Shares credit rather than boasting, and works without needing constant recognition.
TRAIT_F_SELF_IMPORTANT_DESC: Expects special respect and reacts strongly to being ignored or disrespected.
TRAIT_F_FEARFUL_DESC: Quickly detects danger and tends to avoid it, often choosing retreat when odds look bad.
TRAIT_F_FEARLESS_DESC: Less sensitive to threat and acts boldly, rarely hesitating to explore danger or charge in.
TRAIT_F_ANXIOUS_DESC: Frequently anticipates what could go wrong; doubles down on checking and preparation but is vulnerable to stress.
TRAIT_F_CALM_DESC: Keeps composure in unexpected situations and makes steadier decisions under pressure.
TRAIT_F_DEPENDENT_DESC: Prefers support and reassurance over acting alone, sometimes clinging strongly to close bonds.
TRAIT_F_SELF_RELIANT_DESC: Strongly prefers solving problems alone and relies less on others even during crises.
TRAIT_F_SENTIMENTAL_DESC: Warm and empathetic; reacts strongly to others' suffering and often chooses caring actions.
TRAIT_F_TOUGH_MINDED_DESC: Less emotionally shaken and more cool-headed; tends to do less comforting or caretaking.
TRAIT_F_CONFIDENT_DESC: High self-efficacy and willingness to step forward; strong in leadership and persuasion.
TRAIT_F_INSECURE_DESC: Avoids the spotlight and is sensitive to rejection or criticism, increasing stress.
TRAIT_F_BOLD_DESC: Approaches strangers and new situations proactively; increases negotiation, persuasion, and adventurous actions.
TRAIT_F_SHY_DESC: Dislikes speaking up or being the center of attention; tends to gravitate toward solo tasks.
TRAIT_F_GREGARIOUS_DESC: Gains energy from social interaction; builds relationships quickly and boosts group cohesion.
TRAIT_F_SOLITARY_DESC: Feels comfortable alone and tires in crowds; strong at solo work like research or crafting.
TRAIT_F_ENERGETIC_DESC: High energy and quick to act; increases speed but may raise mistakes due to rushing.
TRAIT_F_RESERVED_DESC: Moves quietly with muted expression; slower pace but fewer mistakes and less overheating.
TRAIT_F_FORGIVING_DESC: Doesn't hold grudges long and tries to repair relationships, reducing conflict and stabilizing groups.
TRAIT_F_VENGEFUL_DESC: Remembers slights and seeks payback; increases conflict, sometimes using intimidation to reduce fear.
TRAIT_F_GENTLE_DESC: Treats others gently rather than forcefully; reduces violent and intimidating behaviors.
TRAIT_F_HARSH_DESC: Uses intimidation and dominance; may gain short-term compliance but often loses trust.
TRAIT_F_FLEXIBLE_DESC: Reduces conflict through compromise; increases negotiation and diplomacy, lowering group friction.
TRAIT_F_STUBBORN_DESC: Hard to sway once decided; can stand firm under pressure but may increase conflict by refusing compromise.
TRAIT_F_PATIENT_DESC: Tolerates frustration well and rarely explodes; strong in long projects and negotiations.
TRAIT_F_HOT_TEMPERED_DESC: Anger spikes quickly and can turn behavior harsh; increases charging in combat but hurts teamwork and quality.
TRAIT_F_ORGANIZED_DESC: Plans and organizes systematically, boosting productivity while reducing errors and chaos stress.
TRAIT_F_DISORGANIZED_DESC: Weak at prioritizing and organization; improvises under pressure but makes more mistakes.
TRAIT_F_INDUSTRIOUS_DESC: Works steadily without procrastinating; increases output but may recover stress more slowly due to overwork.
TRAIT_F_LAZY_DESC: Feels effort as costly and tends to procrastinate; may have less short-term stress but lower productivity and reliability.
TRAIT_F_PERFECTIONIST_DESC: Raises standards and quality significantly, but slows work and can increase frustration and stress.
TRAIT_F_CARELESS_DESC: Often misses details and quality control; may be faster but makes more errors and accidents.
TRAIT_F_PRUDENT_DESC: Prioritizes planning over impulse; manages risk and reduces accidents, but may be slow when improvisation is needed.
TRAIT_F_RECKLESS_DESC: Acts impulsively and underestimates risk; increases adventure and charges but raises accidents and large losses.
TRAIT_F_AESTHETIC_DESC: Values aesthetic quality, investing in beauty and decoration in building and crafting.
TRAIT_F_UTILITARIAN_DESC: Prefers efficiency over decoration; makes fast, rational choices but has little interest in creative luxury.
TRAIT_F_CURIOUS_DESC: Seeks new information and experimentation; boosts exploration and research and supports knowledge-driven progress.
TRAIT_F_APATHETIC_DESC: Prefers the familiar and has low learning drive; adapts slowly to rapid change.
TRAIT_F_CREATIVE_DESC: Generates novel solutions and improvises well in tactics and invention; heavy constraints can increase stress.
TRAIT_F_CONVENTIONAL_DESC: Prefers proven methods and convention; strong in routine work but less likely to attempt radical innovation.
TRAIT_F_NONCONFORMIST_DESC: Prefers experimenting over sticking to norms; can spark innovation but may clash with institutions.
TRAIT_F_TRADITIONALIST_DESC: Values tradition and norms; supports stability but may adapt slowly to rapid change.

TRAIT_D_PSYCHOPATH_PRIMARY_DESC: Low empathy and guilt, low fear. Feels little stress from rule-breaking, increasing exploitation and violence.
TRAIT_D_PSYCHOPATH_SECONDARY_DESC: Impulsive, antagonistic, and emotionally volatile; more violence and betrayal with weak long-term planning.
TRAIT_D_MACHIAVELLIAN_DESC: Maximizes gains via long-term planning and manipulation; orderly on the surface but treats trust as a resource.
TRAIT_D_NARCISSIST_GRANDIOSE_DESC: Craves attention and praise with a sense of entitlement; reacts with anger and retaliation when ignored.
TRAIT_D_NARCISSIST_VULNERABLE_DESC: Appears withdrawn yet craves validation and entitlement; high shame and anxiety can destabilize relationships.
TRAIT_D_SADIST_DESC: May derive enjoyment from others' pain or use it instrumentally; increases cruelty with weak inhibitions.
TRAIT_D_CON_ARTIST_DESC: Uses charm and planning to deceive for gain; high persuasion success but poor long-term trust.
TRAIT_D_CULT_LEADER_DESC: Binds a group through charisma and discipline while suppressing dissent and reinforcing personality cult dynamics.
TRAIT_D_OPPORTUNIST_DESC: Puts immediate gain over rules; quickly pivots, betrays, or takes risky opportunities when they appear.
TRAIT_D_BULLY_DESC: Forces compliance through threat and power; increases fear but can erode long-term loyalty and cooperation.
TRAIT_D_CALLOUS_DESC: Low empathy and emotional bonding; does less caretaking and may use others coldly to reach goals.
TRAIT_D_BACKSTABBER_DESC: Social on the surface but readily betrays allies; gains short-term advantage while accelerating group collapse.
TRAIT_D_CORRUPT_OFFICIAL_DESC: Uses organization and authority for rent-seeking; keeps short-term order while institutionalizing corruption.
TRAIT_D_PREDATORY_RAIDER_DESC: Lives through combat and raiding; leads attacks without much fear, but with high cruelty.
TRAIT_D_HISTRIONIC_DESC: Dramatic emotional expression and strong attention-seeking; can attract crowds but may disrupt stable governance.
TRAIT_C_SAINT_DESC: High honesty, agreeableness, and conscientiousness. Greatly increases trust and stability in a community.
TRAIT_C_SAINTESS_DESC: High empathy and moral concern; strongly increases caretaking, healing, and charitable behavior.
TRAIT_C_TYRANT_DESC: High power and charisma but low empathy and fairness; rules through fear and coercion, increasing revolt risk.
TRAIT_C_COLD_DICTATOR_DESC: Cold and aggressive even under pressure; strong in wartime leadership but worsens peacetime conflict.
TRAIT_C_STRATEGIST_DESC: High creativity and planning with potentially weak moral restraint; excels at long-term strategy, espionage, and politics.
TRAIT_C_MASTER_CRAFTSMAN_DESC: A reclusive expert focused on high-quality crafting; greatly increases quality while reducing social activity.
TRAIT_C_VISIONARY_DESC: Future-oriented and persuasive; catalyzes new paths and accelerates tech/culture development events.
TRAIT_C_HERMIT_SAGE_DESC: Avoids crowds but dives deep into scholarship and technology, accelerating research progression.
TRAIT_C_RECONCILER_DESC: Mediates conflicts and repairs relationships quickly, greatly reducing intra-group disputes.
TRAIT_C_BERSERKER_DESC: Very low fear with extremely high aggression; charges and pursues often but is hard to control and may suffer heavy losses.
TRAIT_C_CAREGIVER_DESC: Naturally drawn to nurturing and healing; strong benefits for population stability and family-centered societies.
TRAIT_C_ADVENTURER_DESC: Seeks new lands and knowledge proactively; triggers exploration and settlement events.
TRAIT_C_ASCETIC_DESC: Values discipline and restraint, avoiding indulgence; strong in resource management and survival through crises.
TRAIT_C_FREE_SPIRIT_EXTRO_DESC: Values experience over rules and moves impulsively; increases creative events but also operational mistakes.
TRAIT_C_ZEALOT_DESC: Binds a group through strict discipline and belief, but may suppress dissent and trigger schism or persecution.
TRAIT_C_POLYMATH_DESC: High learning speed and adaptability; boosts research, crafting, and leadership across domains.
TRAIT_C_WALLFLOWER_DESC: Kind and empathetic but avoids the spotlight; may carry internal stress while contributing quietly through care.
TRAIT_C_BORN_LEADER_DESC: Gathers and organizes people while staying calm under pressure; strongly prefers leadership roles.
TRAIT_C_TRICKSTER_DESC: Finds loopholes and bends rules playfully; can improvise clever solutions but may undermine trust.
TRAIT_C_SCIENTIST_DESC: Research-driven and detail-oriented; accelerates technological advancement.
TRAIT_C_REVOLUTIONARY_DESC: Preaches change and disrupts the status quo; can boost innovation while raising conflict.
TRAIT_C_DEMOCRATIC_LEADER_DESC: Leads through trust and consensus; increases cooperation events and reduces revolt risk.
TRAIT_C_ARTIST_DESC: Strong emotion and expression drive; boosts cultural and social events but may be fragile in crises.
TRAIT_C_SURVIVALIST_DESC: Strong at risk preparation and resource management; increases survival in disasters, plagues, and famine.
TRAIT_C_PHILANTHROPIST_DESC: Uses resources for the common good; strongly increases charity and relief actions during crises.
TRAIT_C_MISER_DESC: Overly conserves resources and avoids communal investment; may miss long-term growth opportunities.
TRAIT_C_SPENDTHRIFT_DESC: Increases immediate gratification and flashy spending; uplifting in abundance but vulnerable in famine.
TRAIT_C_SPECULATOR_DESC: Takes calculated risks for big profit; gains influence as economic volatility rises.
TRAIT_C_BORN_MERCHANT_DESC: Expands trade through negotiation and relationship-building; can create long-term trust networks if fair.
TRAIT_C_COLLECTOR_DESC: Collects and organizes valuable items; can support culture, museums, and research stockpiles.
TRAIT_C_ARCHITECT_MASTER_DESC: Builds with both structure and aesthetics; can improve defense, productivity, and beauty satisfaction.
TRAIT_C_ENGINEER_DESC: Enjoys design and problem-solving; becomes core staff for maintenance, invention, and improvement.
TRAIT_C_LABOR_HERO_DESC: Drives production upward; however, burnout risk is high and rest events become important.
TRAIT_C_CHEF_DESC: Improves food quality and satisfaction; strong in morale recovery, bonding, and festival events.
TRAIT_C_BUILDER_FOREMAN_DESC: Assigns people and manages workflow; shortens completion time for large construction projects.
TRAIT_C_DIPLOMAT_DESC: Resolves disputes through negotiation and forms alliances; supports war avoidance, trade expansion, and federation building.
TRAIT_C_SPYMASTER_DESC: Excels at intelligence gathering and covert operations; creates asymmetric advantage in diplomacy and war.
TRAIT_C_ASSASSIN_INSTINCT_DESC: Prefers covert elimination over open confrontation; promotes political assassination and sabotage events.
TRAIT_C_PACIFIST_DESC: Strongly avoids violence, favoring negotiation and support; suffers high stress during warfare.
TRAIT_C_MERCENARY_DESC: Fights for pay and status; becomes a strong narrative driver in systems with contracts, wages, and loot.
TRAIT_C_DEFENDER_DESC: Strong at defense, cover, and retreat timing rather than reckless charges; reduces losses and improves long fights.
TRAIT_C_ASSAULT_CAPTAIN_DESC: Enjoys leading charges and pushing the unit forward; big morale gain on victory, big losses on defeat.
TRAIT_C_STRATEGIST_GENERAL_DESC: A commander combining planning and improvisation; greatly increases combat AI strategic decision quality.
TRAIT_C_GOSSIP_DESC: Spreads information quickly; energizes social networks but can also accelerate distrust and factionalism.
TRAIT_C_COUNSELOR_DESC: Reads emotions and counsels others; reduces mental breaks and speeds up relationship repair.
TRAIT_C_STORYTELLER_DESC: Boosts group morale via stories and performance; synergizes with festivals, legends, and religious spread events.
TRAIT_C_MYSTIC_DESC: Values symbols and ritual over rational proof; strong influence in systems with religion or magic/ritual.
TRAIT_C_SKEPTIC_DESC: Prioritizes verification and logic; resists superstition and propaganda, supporting knowledge-driven progress.
TRAIT_C_PRAGMATIST_DESC: Values results over ideology; makes quick decisions in crises but may slow radical innovation.
TRAIT_C_SETTLER_DESC: Prefers settlement and infrastructure; greatly increases stability and production in agriculture/urbanization stages.
TRAIT_C_NOMAD_DESC: Prefers movement over settling; strong for early exploration and route discovery but weak at stable production.
TRAIT_C_HEALER_DESC: Increases healing and care actions; strongly improves recovery after plagues and wars.
TRAIT_C_ANIMAL_TAMER_DESC: Strong with animals; benefits civilizations that leverage animals for transport, combat, or production.
TRAIT_C_SCOUT_DESC: Continues exploring while managing danger; strong in map-making, resource discovery, and first-contact events.
TRAIT_C_STRICT_COMMANDER_DESC: Maintains organization through discipline and punishment; boosts short-term combat power but seeds resentment.
TRAIT_C_BACKROOM_BROKER_DESC: Profits from illicit trade and brokering; becomes dramatic in systems with contraband, sanctions, or policing.
TRAIT_C_SCHOLAR_SCRIBE_DESC: Accumulates knowledge and records; becomes key staff in writing, administration, and science stages.
TRAIT_C_THIEF_DESC: Skilled at theft and infiltration; creates tension in systems with policing, locks, and surveillance.
TRAIT_C_PEACEKEEPER_DESC: Tries to enforce rules fairly; strong at crime suppression and dispute mediation.
TRAIT_C_AGITATOR_DESC: Moves crowds to amplify conflict or accelerate change; may trigger revolution or riot events.
TRAIT_C_INVENTOR_DESC: Creates new tools and methods; acts as a catalyst for technological era transitions.
TRAIT_C_ENCYCLOPEDIA_DESC: Accumulates and transfers broad knowledge, increasing education and technology diffusion speed.
TRAIT_C_HERETIC_DESC: Challenges established doctrine and institutions; accelerates innovation but may trigger persecution and conflict.
TRAIT_C_MEDIATOR_KING_DESC: Uses authority to mediate conflict and govern fairly; very strong for domestic stability and alliance maintenance.
